name: Skaters and Coppers
description:
Does bursting through streets and train stations on a skateboard, rushing through police officers, zipping through vortexes and collecting power ups sound pretty neat?

Then Skaters and Coppers may be just the game for you.

Skaters and Coppers is an Endless 2D Runner which will test your reactions to dodging enemies, staying alive and crafting the highest score possible.

Choose Your Character

Play as either a female or male skater, and cause total mayhem as you ride endlessly through various levels.

Power Ups

Burst through police officers and whirling vortexes, collecting power ups like the awesome might of the hoverboard.

Collect Coins and Time Bonuses

Collect coins and tally up a high score, one that rules over others. Collect time bonuses, and don’t rush towards the dreaded  “Game Over” message.

Avoid Enemies or Burst Through Them

In Skaters and Coppers barge into police officers and whirl through vortexes in hoverboard mode or simply leap over them and keep that score rising.

Fire Yo-Yos

Collect yo-yos off the ground and propel them to stun police officers.

Play On Your Phone

Play Skaters and Coppers on your mobile phone.

Created By Drystone

I am Drystone, a sole developer who uses the Unity game engine to create 2D/3D games and mobile applications. With close to two years of experience in Unity and the C# language I have created my first game, Skaters and Coppers.

I wish you all the fun and appreciate any feedback on the game, whether on bugs, critical feedback or questions.

Thank you and please enjoy this small mobile game.
